Wish I could love this game.  It seems great for people who already know how to play it.  I completely understand why every time it gets a player boost it immediately drops back down, though.
  In the days I've tried to learn it I found 1 person who was willing to help me.  Single player seems useless, can barely ever even get it to work.  Can't get voice chat to work, tried fixes I found online.. couldn't get help in-game.
  It seems like anyone who wants to expand the playerbase is just drowned out by people who want their autistically involved games to go uninterrupted by anything.  To them new players are an unwelcome distraction and they're glad when you and your questions are gone.

   In short, great if you're already a long term player, apparently useless for new players.

P.S.- I've been trying to get into this game for over a year off & on.
Unfortunately it's a dead game, even on weekends. I love the game but unfortunately there is no servers populated, even on the weekends.

STORIA: Non ha storia.
GAMEPLAY: Match 3
GRAFICA: Semplice adatta al tipo di gioco.
SONORO: Buona di accompagnamento.
CONTROLLER: Giocato con mouse e tastiera senza problemi.
DURATA: Circa 2 ore
RUN COMPLETAMENTO: Nessuna non ha achievement.
COMMENTO: Il classico gioco casual dove bisogna matchare gli oggetti, carino ma niente di eccezionale. Da usare come tappa buchi quando si ha poco tempo per giocare. Da prendere solo in forte sconto.
VOTO: 70/100

What you'd expect from PopCap and the aesthetics are intensely charming. 
It screams Xbox Live.

Really fun puzzler!  It might require a bit of additional setup (a guide of which is available on the Steam Guides page), but it's not that hard to do!  The difficulty can ramp up pretty quickly and there is a lack of content (this is a simple game from 2004 after all), but it's still worth it!  If you're hesitant (and patient), wait for a sale.  This game and a lot of PopCap's older catalog frequently go on sale for $1 dollar a game!

A solid puzzle game using bricks and colors! (Played using a fix to get the game running and working on Windows 11)

AstroPop Deluxe is a brick based puzzle-game developed by PopCap. It follows 4 different space pilots as they crush same-colored bricks with a variety of different brick types, and devastating super weapons. It's a simple gameplay loop that gets it's mileage with addicting gameplay thanks to it's simplicity. 

Gameplay of AstroPop first starts with choosing a Pilot Character, while you only have 2 at the start, you'll be able to unlock them as you play through the campaigns. Character selection boils down to what type of Super Weapon you'll be use once it's meter is full, otherwise they all play the same. The goal of each level is to pop enough colored bricks to power your meter to blast off to the next level. As the name suggest these bricks are color coded, and break when 4 or more come in contact with each other. You make these matches by moving the colors between each other by columns, making it very strategic compared to other puzzle games of the "match" style. There's also special bricks that spawn as a round progress, ranging from making a specific color explosive, clearing a line either vertically or horizontally or ones like the stone and metal bricks that only serve to block your matches, requiring one or more nearby matches to break. As well as the Virus block which will start infecting other bricks into other Virus blocks until all of them are defeated. As mentioned you also have super weapon that charges on it's own and can be activated on a whim, allowing you to gain a significant edge if the current round you have is going poorly. Every handful of levels you can get story cutscenes, save points, and bonus levels that provide a brick puzzle to get the maximum amount of bonus points. 

Overall, AstroPop Deluxe is a fun little puzzle game. It certainly stand out from other match puzzles games you see all over the mobile app store and has a fun theming and artstyle to boot. It's somewhat lengthy if you try to complete all the characters campaigns but it's mostly more of the same between the 4 characters outside of their super weapons. Really this game needed a sequel like with what Bejeweled and Zuma got to really expand on this base idea with new gamemodes, pilots, or just other things to give more variety. But as a whole, other than the whole needing to fix the game to make saving work on modern hardware, it's a pretty swell purchase! Even more so on sale cause it shrinks down to just 1$!

Les commandes repondent bien et le graphisme est correct quoique daté de nos jours .
Un bon petit jeu qui vous occupera pendant une voire deux heures ....

Interet : 12/20
Realisation : 12/20

[h1]Same monotonous game as 2, with new features:

Cooperative mode is single-player, but you get to play/shoot with two characters standing beside each other. Making the game much easier.
Multiplayer mode is like Stick Arena. But it's dead so there's no one to play with.
The resolution is STILL 1024x768 but this time there's NO option to even attempt to change it in-game!
Just like the other f*cking games before, you can change the resolution/values yourself by opening "[i]steamapps/common/RIP 3 - The Last Hero/RIP3/config[/i]" in notepad.
AND THIS TIME NO STEAM-IN-GAME WTF!?

I don't know if I'd pay $4.99 for this "trilogy".
I made a flash game in high school that was better than this.
Sh*t, who knew if I still kept the Adobe Flash file I could make bank through Steam.

This is a travesty.

4/10[/h1]

Игра детсва

Бодрая мясорубка с видом сверху, придется по вкусу фанатам Crimsonland'a. С помощью нехитрого сюжета, игра проведет вас по полусотни уровней, рассказываю попутно о том что за писец тут творится. На выбор доступно шесть персонажей, каждый уникален и обладает разным умениями, так же по ходу игры вам будет попадаться разное вооружение и техника. Для своего времени игра была прям огонь.

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
— Обычно в таких играх не дают выбирать, кем придется быть игроку, но тут есть выбор аж из шести персонажей!
— Разнообразное вооружения для окрашивания всего в красный цвет
— Бодрая музыка

[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
— Нет режима выживания, который обязателен для подобных игр
— Нет возможности сохранить уникальное оружие которое получаешь за прохождение игры, при перепрохождении сюжет сам его отберет...
